snippet: The man was preparing to board a flight in Midland, Tex., when explosives in military-grade wrapping were discovered in his luggage, officials said.
abstract: An active-duty service member is detained at Midland International Airport in Houston, Texas, after explosives in military-grade wrapping are discovered in his luggage; discovery leads to evacuation of the terminal.
lead_paragraph: The man was preparing to board a flight in Midland, Tex., when explosives in military-grade wrapping were discovered in his luggage, officials said.

headline.seo: Serviceman Held in Midland, Tex., After Explosives Found in Luggage
headline.main: Serviceman Held for Carrying Explosives Into Texas Airport
headline.print_headline: Serviceman Held for Carrying Explosives Into Texas Airport

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
